publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2544.1 Johann Lamont: Missed Out, Missing Out—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2544) in the name of Kenneth Gibson, insert at end "and further considers that this review should include single outcome agreements and the extent to which they make provision for adults with learning disability a priority." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-2544.1 Johann Lamont: Missed Out, Missing Out—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2544) in the name of Kenneth Gibson, insert at end "and further considers that this review should include single outcome agreements and the extent to which they make provision for adults with learning disability a priority." Supported by: Hugh Henry*
S3M-2544.1 Missed Out, Missing Out (lodged on 24 September 2008) Cathy Jamieson*
